verbose_text: In the present study, a selective mGluR5 agonist (R, S)-2-chloro-5-hydroxyphenylglycine (CHPG), which does not activate mGluR1, was used to examine the specific contribution of mGluR5 to neuronal damage after TBI.
evidence: mGluR5 agonist (R,S)-2-chloro-5-hydroxyphenylglycine (CHPG), which does not activate mGluR1
